mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROD_PLAN_DETAIL( id, prod_plan_code, prod_code, prod_spec, prod_num, least_time, most_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{leastTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mostTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_PROD_PLAN_DETAIL( id, prod_plan_code, prod_code, prod_spec, prod_num, least_time, most_time, create_time ) VALUES
( #{tProdPlanDetail.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tProdPlanDetail.prodPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tProdPlanDetail.prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tProdPlanDetail.prodSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tProdPlanDetail.prodNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tProdPlanDetail.leastTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tProdPlanDetail.mostTime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tProdPlanDetail.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PROD_PLAN_DETAIL SET id = #{id}, prod_plan_code = #{prodPlanCode}, prod_code = #{prodCode}, prod_spec = #{prodSpec}, prod_num = #{prodNum}, least_time = #{leastTime}, most_time = #{mostTime}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
